results.title: The Association between Metformin Use and Risk of Developing Severe Dementia among AD Patients with Type 2 Diabetes
results.text_hl: In the non-@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group, the mean time to severe @<m>DISEASE_Dementia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003704 @@@dementia@@@ was 145 +- 3.4 months.

results.title: Association Between Specific Type 2 Diabetes Therapies and Risk of Alzheimer's Disease and Related Dementias in Propensity-Score Matched Type 2 Diabetic Patients
results.text_hl: In this cohort study A-HgM exposure was associated with decreased diagnosis of @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@AD@@@ (RR, 0.61; 95% CI, 0.59-0.62; p < 0.001), @DISEASE_Dementia_Vascular @DISEASE_MESH:D015140 @@@vascular dementia@@@ (RR, 0.72; 95% CI, 0.69-0.74; p < 0.001) and non-@DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@AD dementia@@@ (RR, 0.67; 95% CI, 0.66-0.68; p < 0.001). @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ was associated with the greatest risk reduction and @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ with the least reduction in risk compared to @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ not receiving A-HgM for @<m>DISEASE_Dementia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003704 @@@ADRD@@@ risk.

citations.NLM: Torrandell-Haro G, Branigan GL, Brinton RD, Rodgers KE. Association Between Specific Type 2 Diabetes Therapies and Risk of Alzheimer's Disease and Related Dementias in Propensity-Score Matched Type 2 Diabetic Patients Front Aging Neurosci. 2022;14():878304. PMID: 35601622

results.title: The association of antidiabetic medications and Mini-Mental State Examination scores in patients with diabetes and dementia
results.text_hl: Similarly, the studies on sulfonylurea derivates have found either no association or higher relative risk of @<m>DISEASE_Dementia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003704 @@@dementia@@@ compared to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.
